survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Co-Working Spaces
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and identify areas for improvement in co-working space services.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall cleanliness of the co-working space?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall cleanliness of the co-working space?

questions.question_text: Which amenities do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question. Limit to top 5 amenities for brevity.

script.question_text: Which amenities do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the co-working space?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question. Allow for detailed feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the co-working space?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this co-working space to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Critical for NPS calculation.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this co-working space to others?

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for using this co-working space?
questions.client_notes: Include 'Other' with optional text field for specifics.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (single-choice) with conditional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for using this co-working space?
